edit.message: The current shopping cart (if existed) will be removed! Do you still want to edit this order?

remove.message: Do you want to remove this product from the cart?

cancel.message: Are you sure to cancel this order?

reorder.message: The current shopping cart (if existed) will be removed! Do you still want to re-order this order?

changeCartType.message:

noItemSelected.message: You need to select at least (01) item to continue
